comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: As the picture shows a Friedrichshafen G type with a single fin, this is a Friedrichshafen G.III. The later developments G.IIIa and G.IV and G.V all had a "double tail" section, that is two rudders and two elevators in a box like construction. This is a classic view of a brand new looking Friedrichshafen G.III arriving in the field, with lots of interested personnel who want to inspect this technical marvel.
